content: follow me on instagram for early access new designs and giveaways ravelry ravelry designs by kayla baldwin instagram https //www instagram com/natural knits/ abbreviations and techniques st s stitch es k knit p purl bor beginning of round co cast on pm place marker sl slip one stitch generally purlwise unless otherwise indicated k2tog knit 2 sts together 1 st decreased ssk slip 2 stitches as if to knit insert left needle into the stitches from back to front k2tog dip see photo tutorial below 7 starfall socks - chart and written instructions row 1 k1 p3 row 2 k1 p3 row 3 k1 p3 row 4 dip p3 photo tutorial for dip stitch ribbing dip insert right needle into 3rd knit stitch on left needle 3 row below grab working yarn pull through 8 slip to left needle as shown with left needle going from back to front k2tog tbl knit 2 together through the back loop make sure to keep this a little bit tight it opens up the stitch below and looks like a yo or loop and this is what it looks like when finished 9 short row photo tutorial toe up sock heel ds on rs with yarn at front slip next stitch purlwise pull working yarn until the two legs of the stitch are showing elongated stitch continue knitting next stitch ds on ws with yarn at front slip next stitch purlwise pull working yarn until the two legs of the stitch are showing elongated stitch continue purling next stitch 10
